item.title: About
item.author: clint@clintarmstrong.net (Clint Armstrong)
item.description:
Devops engineer posting about the technologies I use and things that interest me.

More Information

These days I’m managing Ubuntu, FreeBSD and Windows servers, leveraging SaltStack and PowerShell whenever possible to build stable and repeatable configurations.

Contact me
